title: Help me get this font
content:
please check the picture below and help me find the font  
Thank you.

author: donskele

comments.content:
I don't think this is a font.  
There is this [P22 Declaration Script.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822070650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/declaration/)  
Or this. [1791-constitution.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822070650/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/glc/1791-constitution/)
